name: High Speed Ramps
description:
3 hour game jam on the theme Faster..FASTER...F-A-S-T-E-R!

Press A and D to move the car left and right. 

M to turn off music.

Collect the speed balls at the top of the speed ramps to increase your speed. 

The ramps move too.

Build up as much speed as possible before the big ramp at the end.

See how far you can jump.

Good luck! 

NOTE: Had to re-upload as there was a game-breaking bug in the WebGL build. 

Sound credits from freesound.org

Alex Candrell - Rubber Crunch Whoosh
frankum - Axon 01 Techno Track loop 
 DerJulie - Vespa Driving
Inspector J - Falling Comedic
